message.content: {"id": "50793", "title": "Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch", "description": "When a ServletRequestListener is defined, it is expected that when invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest should be ASYNC. However, in this case, the DispatcherType is incorrectly returned as REQUEST instead. This is a bug.", "OB": "After a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest should be ASYNC, but it is incorrectly returned as REQUEST.", "EB": "The DispatcherType should be returned as ASYNC instead of REQUEST after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().", "SR": "Update the implementation of the ServletRequestListener to ensure that the correct DispatcherType, ASYNC, is returned after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch()."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
